io.github.iwyfewwnt.uwutils

Class UwResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.iwyfewwnt.uwutils.UwResource

  • public final class UwResource
extends Object
    A resource utility.

    UwResource is the utility class that provide functionality to operate with resource files.

    • Method Summary

      • getAsStringOrElse

        public static String getAsStringOrElse(String path,
                                       Charset charset,
                                       ClassLoader classLoader,
                                       String defaultValue)
        Safely get a resource file and read it into string or return a default value.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the resource file
        charset - charset that is the resource file represented in
        classLoader - class loader to get the resource file from
        defaultValue - default value to return on failure
        Returns:
        content of the resource file or the default value

      • getAsStringOrElse

        public static String getAsStringOrElse(String path,
                                       Charset charset,
                                       String defaultValue)
        Safely get a resource file and read it into string or return a default value.

        Wraps getAsStringOrElse(String, Charset, ClassLoader, String) w/ null as the class loader.

        Parameters:
        path - path to the resource file
        charset - charset that is the resource file represented in
        defaultValue - default value to return on failure
        Returns:
        content of the resource file or the default value
